TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you are only a brain, eyes, and ears.

I wish that my drag chutes would stop failing on my Dart SSTO.

Granted, but.... well they are the only things that stay on...

I wish I could play KSP all day.

Granted. The entire electrical system is replaced by a couple of flimsy solar panels. They break whenever a raindrop touches them and are only sufficient to power KSP at 1/8th.

I wish that writing would function as computers.

Granted, but all the computers gain homicidal A.I.'s, so they have to be put down.

I wish the Sims 4 was actually worth pre-ordering.

Granted but you die before it's released.

I wish I had a social life.

Granted but now you have no computer

I wish every game was free.

granted you turn back into the animal of your choice, and are free from money.

I wish i m unable to feel every being blood as my own tears.

Granted. You are now a human.

I wish for a large block of space rations.

Granted, you are now 20 times as small as before and get the same amount,

I wish for a new kind of space kraken
Granted. This one exists in real life. It destroys Voyager 1, and then the Earth.
I wish sun was smart enough to give me a wish to grant.

Granted. But it returns your wish with solar flares, evaporating you.

I wish whoever's in the next post doesn't wish something.

Granted, but under Article 10 of the U.D.H.R. (Universal Declaration of Human Rights) I am allowed to say (or wish for) anything I want.

I wish I had an Alienware laptop with K.S.P. on it.

Granted. The only thing it can run is the simulation of the same rocket, over and over. It doesn't have enough dV to leave Kerbin. Nice framerate, though.

I wish that my computer magically expanded to be compatible with 8 more gigabytes of RAM

You get your extra 8 GB, but you now have to load your entire OS from 8" floppies.

I wish for a gin and tonic.

No.

I wish for this wish to not be corrupted.

Too fooping bad!

I wish lamp would love me back. *sob*

No. Face the wrath of reality.

I wish HOCgaming would release the next episode of Lifeless Planet!

Granted, Kerbal Polar Expedition 2 is cancelled. More people now live without clean water.

I wish i could solve my hunger issues

Granted. You have everyone else's hunger issues.

I wish for a lamp for a lawyer instead of Soldier.

...

I wish people would make more understandable wishes.

Granted. The ones that can normally be never understood are now only understood by the Men of Rohan.

I wish for a mobile.

You get a mobile home instead of what you probably wished for.

I wish... for something to wish for.

You wish for something to wish for, which is to wish something to wish for. You are stuck in a infinite wish loop.

I wish I could spawn fans at demand.

Granted, but because of homonyms, you get a 50-50 blend of artificial wind devices and groupies.

I wish I knew why I can't give rep to posts within the forum games.
